short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to manage Google Calendar events, integrated with Google Sheets for dynamic data population.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly create and manage Google Calendar events directly from your browser with seamless Google Sheets integration.

Integrate data from a Sheet to populate form that handles Calendar Event creation.
